comment: RIP Cpl. Nathan Cirillo of the Argyll and Sutherland Highlanders.From US my prayers are with your family
amr:
# ::snt RIP Cpl. Nathan Cirillo of the Argyll and Sutherland Highlanders.From US my prayers are with your family
(w / wish-01
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :ARG1 (r / rest-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Nathan"
                        :op2 "Cirillo")
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (m / military
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Argyll"
                                    :op2 "and"
                                    :op3 "Sutherland"
                                    :op4 "Highlanders"))
                        :ARG2 (c / commander
                              :mod (c2 / chief))))
            :ARG2 (f / family
                  :poss (y / you)))
      :source (c3 / country
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "US")))
